column2: we were seated promptly and our server came to greet us quickly. We ordered 2 blue moon beers
column3: as well as a bruschetta appetizer. We placed our pizza order as well
column4: since the pizza can sometimes take some time to cook. Our starters were relatively tasty
column5: but I noticed that we were waiting quite a while for our pizza
column6: which I could understand that it was a busy Saturday night and the pizza was also deep dish which can take some time.
